data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound demonstrated in the research?
What type of motifs does the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane assemble into with perchlorate ions?
What is the crystal system of the compound with the empirical formula C27 H32 N4 06?
Does the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane form a 1:1 complex with dicarboxylic acids?
What is the role of the adamantyl spacer in the bisamide 1?
data.answer: It introduces more demanding spatial requirements between the 1,3-bis(pyridylamino) subunits.

data.question: What type of self-assembly does the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane form with Cu(II) ions?
data.answer: One-dimensional polynuclear assembly of Cu(II) ions as infinite linear arrays

data.question: Is the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane capable of forming discrete complexes?
What is the significance of the syn-anti conformation in the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane?
data.answer: It is most suitable for generating continuous self-assemblies.

data.question: What does the FT-IR spectra indicate about the complexes formed by the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane?
data.answer: The complexes retain their hydrogen-bonded character in solution.

data.question: Can the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane form hydrogen-bonded infinite ribbons with perchlorate ions?
What is the role of the 2-aminopyridine group in the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane?
data.answer: It acts as a binding pocket for dicarboxylic acids.

data.question: What does the presence of two 2-aminopyridine subunits suggest about the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane?
data.answer: It suggests that the molecule may be tailor-made for creating infinite hydrogen-bonding linear arrays of 1,Ï‰-dicarboxylic acids.

data.question: What is the crystal system of the compound with the empirical formula C32 H42 N4 06?
What is the space group of the compound with the empirical formula C26 H30 N4 06?
Does the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane adopt a cofacial orientation of its two pairs of N, O coordinating centers in the presence of perchlorate ions?
What does the X-ray quality crystal structure of the complexes of 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane with dicarboxylic acids provide?
What is the significance of the syn-anti arrangement of the 1,3-bis(pyridylamino)subunits in the solid state?
data.answer: It is self-complementary and dimerizes to form cyclic dimers.

data.question: What does the presence of a carboxylic acid hydrogen bonded to an aromatic ring nitrogen indicate in the FT-IR spectra?
data.answer: The formation of a hydrogen-bonded complex rather than an ionic complex.

data.question: What does the ROESY NMR spectra of the complexes of 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane with dicarboxylic acids show?
data.answer: An extended nature of the complexes.

data.question: Is the molecule 1,3-bis[(pyrid-2-ylamino)carbonyl]adamantane capable of forming polynuclear chains with Cu(II) ions?
